QuestData.Title: A Grummle's Luck
QuestData.Description: The yaungols stole our luckydos! Mean riders with spears took them from our caravan of brothers coming down the Burlap Trail.$b$bThis is very bad fortune. If the yaungol discover the secrets of luckydos all grummles will be in big trouble.$b$bRecover our luckydos from Fire Camp Ruqin north of here and we will pay many fortunes to you.
QuestData.CompletionText: A luckydo is a thing of much good fortune. Yaungol know nothing of how to use luckydos... yet.
QuestData.RewardText: Hurray! Our Luckydos. Many thanks and fortune to friend of grummles!
